file.desc: This file contains combinations of command line arguments known to work (or at least they show something). The first item in each test is its brief description, i.e. what its supposed to produce, second item is the combination of command line arguments to achieve this and the last item is the directory with HoloToolkit configuration files. These can be used directly with HoloToolkit Utilities or that can be opened in HTConfigManager from tools directory.
